title: Ages of Conflict: World War Simulator Free Download
description:
Ages of Conflict is a versatile World War Simulation Game. In this game you observe randomized or custom created AI nations interact with each other and ultimately try to control the world in a massive free-for-all, including alliances, revolts and all kinds of political twists The game comes with multiple pre-made maps and scenarios, but you can also create your own in the map painter, and use maps and scenarios made by others.
You can affect the world by changing the names of nations, force them to battle, peace, ally or simply collapse with a click of a button This game can also work as a tool for world building , thanks to its ability to keep track of nations long since passed. The game has statistics which can help in finding ancient nations and comparing them to each other. With the right settings the game has the possibility of simulating a world for tens of thousands of years. FIFA 23 Ultimate Edition
